website_summaries.verdict: If you plan on working out with a weighted hula hoop for a long time, we highly suggest researching the wide variety of size, pressure, and weight options available from Sports Hoop to find the best one for you.
cons: While the Sports Hoop is straightforward to put together, it’s not nearly as easy to disassemble

customer_reviews.title: Well-Made, high quality product!
customer_reviews.text: This hula hoop is very well made! This is the second one of this product that I have ordered, because I like it so much. The hula hoop has a foam cushion are around it an be it's weighed, so it is very comfortable to use (even fire longer periods. If you have never used the hula hoop before, just take your time and practice. This product is great for an abdominal workout! I highly recommend this product. Please mark if you find my review helpful. Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: PeggyTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Provides hours of entertainment...for the neighbors!
customer_reviews.text: Well, it's providing a lot of entertainment for the neighbors! 3lbs is not too heavy for a workout...but it's heavy enough that you want to make sure you don't bust yourself in the mouth trying to do tricks. Just saying. Anyway... here's to pretending like I'm a kid again, and not a 50 year old middle aged grandmother trying to get rid of menopausal weight gain ((sigh))
customer_reviews.author: MtrcyclMiMi

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Exercise Tool!
customer_reviews.text: After spending days researching and reading reviews on other hoops, I decided to order this one. Completely satisfied with this purchase. Arrives in a sturdy box. Easy click assembly! I was concerned about the 3lb weight since RecCenter hoops were very lightweight. This weight and size is perfect for me. I was able to immediately start hooping. Due to hoop weight I will only use this hoop full clothed and probably with waste belt. I’m 5’2” 140lbs. Box wordIng states hoop is sized for 100-160lbs. I do not plan on disassembling hoop after getting each section locked in place. Fast delivery was a plus since I needed to start exercising my middle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice sizeble hoola hoop
customer_reviews.text: This is great. It was too big but the cool thing is that you can take pieces off as they snap together (very firmly) so you can customize. It's been over 30 years since I did the hoola hoop so it took quite a bit of practice but it's great exercise. You can do this while watching TV in the privacy of your own home.
customer_reviews.author: LOKO

customer_reviews.title: Such a fun workout!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a couple of different workout hoops and this one is definitely my favorite! It's super easy to use and I love that it can come apart for storage. I did have a slight problem the first day I used it with it coming apart during use and it also made my sides tender, but I fixed the problem by rechecking and really pushing tegether the segments and after a few more uses, the tenderness was gone.
customer_reviews.author: kadra

customer_reviews.title: We were having too much fun to stop when we should have
customer_reviews.text: All of us in the family can make it work. None of us had ever been able to use a hula hoop before. We did have a little trouble with bruising at first, but that is because we did not follow the manufacturer's instructions. We were having too much fun to stop when we should have. The sections came apart at first, but we examined the connecting points, figured out what we did wrong and have not had any trouble since. I was worried about spending so much money for a hoop, but I'm glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Randleman

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Hate it keep falling apart been purchased it just put it together hate it HATE IT I dislike wasting money pure waste
customer_reviews.author: Nakeiya Thomas

customer_reviews.title: I'm so glad I purchased this hoop
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I purchased this hoop. It's so much easier to use than the first one I bought which was only 39 inches around. This one is 41 inches and it makes a huge difference using it. I returned the first one. I thought 3 lbs might be too much weight, but it's not. It's so much easier to use and I've already moved up to 15 minutes a day after only a week. YES IT'S A GOOD WORKOUT! I was surprised just how good. I definately recommend this hoop! :)
customer_reviews.author: Lori S.

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this weighted hula hoop. Such a fun way to exercise and get moving. My husband even started using it and enjoys it as well. Good for cardio, digestive, everything. The weight of it gently pushes on the organs, much like yoga to stimulate and heal. We have had it for quite a while now and it is still in great shape, no wear and tear. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Herbie41

customer_reviews.title: Hula Hoop was easy to put together after I figured out how the ...
customer_reviews.text: Hula Hoop was easy to put together after I figured out how the pieces for together, must be securely fastened or hoop will fly off while working out. My husband was able to use a hula hoop for the first time due to the extra weight. Use as directed and build up to the maximum recommended time for working out, the workout is more intense than a regular hula hoop.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the hoop is very good quality and simple to use
customer_reviews.text: The graphics on the packaging appear to be from the 80s and I guess that's the point because the color of the hoop kind of look the same way. No matter the appearance, the hoop is very good quality and simple to use. I had some discomfort from the weight but the padding helped me avoid visible bruising. I'd definitely recommend it to anyone looking for a weighted hoop!
customer_reviews.author: Reed

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend to anyone and already got one for my sister
customer_reviews.text: I ADORE THIS THING!! Just a couple minutes and I'm already in cardio mode sweatin' my butt off! Longest I've gone for was only 17 minutes and it was a workout! Not too heavy but definitely heavy enough to require effort. Not hard to operate either, I got the hang of it very quickly! Would recommend to anyone and already got one for my sister!
customer_reviews.author: Eden

customer_reviews.title: Really Good
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble. Good product. Only problem is if you hula hoop with it on a certain side facing up it will make your stomach sore (not from the exercise, but the bumps in the hula hoop for it to connect) Just flip it on the side where the "bumps" (where the hula hoop connects) facing up side. Other than that it's a good product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wish I bought it sooner
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Need to get used to the hoop and the weight hitting my hips. Key is to tighten your butt and your abs and use your core. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Q

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: This hula hoop has been fun...it took a while to get used to it because my hips felt sore and bruised for several days after initially using it, even with the padding. It did come apart several times also, but now that I am used to it, I try to use it for ten minutes a day.
customer_reviews.author: Curlyconch

customer_reviews.title: I LUV this HOOP!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this hoop in 2011 and am ready for another in 2019! My hoop has always stayed assembled and has never come apart. I would recommend sticking with the initial 5 minutes to start or you will get bruises around your waist and hips. Give your body time to adjust to the weight. With that said, I have been so pleased with this product. Started seeing (and feeling) results within the 1st week. I am 5'4" tall/130 lbs. and have no problem with the 41" size. The only reason I'm purchasing a new one is because my hoop has been used and abused. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Linda L Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Ultimate fitness gear
customer_reviews.text: I am a weighted hula hoop fanatic. Though I've graduated to the 5.5 lb hoops, at times I like to revert to a less weighted hoop if I want to do about an hour of hooping. The 5.5 lb hoops have ridges and/or bubbles on the inside and extended hooping can put pressure on the hip and rib bones. The 3lb and 4lb hoops are smooth inside so they are more comfortable if you want to go long. In any event, I love all of my hoops. I am a mover and shaker when I use a hoop so I get cardio and waist training. I highly recommend all weighted hoops be included in a fitness routine. What a blast!!!
customer_reviews.author: SonjaM

customer_reviews.title: I had good intentions when I purchased it
customer_reviews.text: My coworker brought her hoop to work and I was just hooping it up! This one looked similar to hers so I purchased it. HUGE dud! Too heavy, too big...maybe it was buyer error but it now rests behind my headboard and there it will likely die in peace.
customer_reviews.author: CMac

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and easy to use hoop
customer_reviews.text: Very nice weighted hoop! I bought it a month ago and since that time all my family members (my husband and 9 years old son) use it daily! It has nice bright colors and it is very easy to use. And what is most important - it helps to make our waists thinner only for 30 minutes of working out a day.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect Hula hoop
customer_reviews.text: After a little help from a neighbor with putting it together the product was perfect. I just wasnt strong enough to twist the end together correctly. Beautiful colors and soft to touch. Just perfect
customer_reviews.author: Ladybug

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It did give me some slight bruising on my sides first couple times use but doesn't now. Started out just 10 minutes each time and now up to 20 mins. It's a workout..no joke. Worked up more sweat than jogging on treadmill !! Love to use this in between treadmill.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... have read all reviews about that and found some useful info to me
customer_reviews.text: Before I have bought this item i have read all reviews about that and found some useful info to me.in spite of this hula hoop weighted just 3 pounds( not like other that more harder) it helps to keep my waist in good shape and form and makes stronger my core muscles .no bruising or damaged my body tissues.i use it 30 min per day. It even massages my working area because of soft cover.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great hula hoop
customer_reviews.text: This is a great hula hoop. I just got it yesterday and already know I'll love it. It was easy to put together. It's feels sturdy and I can tell it's going to be some fun and beneficial calorie burning.
customer_reviews.author: Tartle

customer_reviews.title: Fun to use!
customer_reviews.text: This was definitely an impulse buy, but I don't regret it! Kind of wish the return window was longer so I could have exchanged it for a heavier hoop. Its easy to assemble and disassemble. Fun to do after a workout, especially watching the workout video that comes with it! Doing this just by itself I don't think is enough of a workout, but its a fun cardio for your mid section!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm having fun with this sports hoop
customer_reviews.text: I'm having fun with this sports hoop. A weighted hoop is like magic I was able to hoop for 70 rotations on the first try! I followed the recommendations to only use it for a few minutes in the beginning and worked my way up to more time over a couple weeks. I was a bit sore during this part (with three pounds whirling around your waist and ribs that's to be expected.) I bruise easily but didn't have visible bruising like others reported. The padding seems to damage rather easily if it hits something. Overall I'm quite pleased and thrilled I can hoop again like I did as a young child.
customer_reviews.author: Karin Marlett Choi

customer_reviews.title: what a workout!
customer_reviews.text: It is an aerobic and muscle workout, I was amazed the difference the weighted hoop makes. I have to really work to keep it going. Assembly is easy, no problems with it falling apart as some mention. If this happened to you it either is a defective hoop or the attachment wasn't made correctly, meaning you did not attach the pieces correctly. After you have it together all of the pieces should fit snugly, without a gap. If there is a gap, push the pieces together firmly with a slight twisting motion to lock in place.
customer_reviews.author: Granny GP

customer_reviews.title: Sports hoop
customer_reviews.text: My friend had me order this one. I haven't tried it yet; I'm doing other exercises. She's lost 25-40 lbs and says that doing 30 minutes is equivalent to doing time at the gym. Google it for results.
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: Great Weight Hoop
customer_reviews.text: This hula hoop is GREAT! I got the 3 pounder, and it is just so much fun to exercise with this thing. I play music and try to dance too lol. But I have experience, they used to have a weighted hoop in the gym I went to and I did it all.the.time. Highly recommend. You just need to make sure it's clicked together correctly or it'll come undone! Don't worry if it happens to you, though, it's totally fixable. It happened to me I think twice before I got it down. Anyway, if you're looking for a weighted hoop, look no more!
customer_reviews.author: Molls

customer_reviews.title: Addictive effective fun!
customer_reviews.text: Very fun and extremely effective. It was easy to put together and it has stayed together. My kids are exercising with it, I am exercising with it and my daughter is using it to exercise our dogs by having them jump through it. My kids said, "Oh look! Mommy finally has toys!" Watch out though. You will work up a sweat fast with this! It's seriously fun exercise. I've been doing a variety of exercises but I have lost an inch on my waist and hips. I think this helped with that.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Good workout and no bruising
customer_reviews.text: Really good hoola hoop. I feel a slight burning in the waist area everything, I am done with it. So it definitely does it's job, doesn't hit hard as the one with the bumps and no bruises.
customer_reviews.author: Zarina A.

customer_reviews.title: So far I like it but I do not use it everyday
customer_reviews.text: So far I like it but I do not use it everyday. Only when I remember and sometimes it hurts on my sides but it just me because I'm not use to it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Joss

customer_reviews.title: Fun, once you get the hang of it!
customer_reviews.text: I do like the hoop, it's harder to use than I thought. Initially I was shopping for a quality hoop for my daughter, the kids type are hard to use beacause they are so light. That introduced me to a weighted hoop, they whe family is having fun with it. I just ordered the small/lighter one form my daughter she 7yrs. old. So we can hola together.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Great hoop, read instructions!!
customer_reviews.text: The hoop went together very easily and I started using it right away without reading any of the warnings. I can hoop for a very long time so I just started doing it for about 10 minutes a day but was extremely sore after the first 3 days. I pulled the instructions out and saw that you are only supposed to do it for 3 minutes a day for the first 2 weeks then no more than 10 minutes a day after that. So I cut back for a week and now I do it 5-10 minutes everyday and no more soreness. I could feel my abs getting tighter right away. I am excited to keep using this hoop.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle W

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t work for me I can’t even get it to Spin !!
customer_reviews.text: It’s durable and sturdy but I can’t make it go it’s way too heavy for me it just drops to the floor. I am stuck with a big hoop lol !
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Rios

customer_reviews.title: Great hoop!
customer_reviews.text: To tell you the truth I haven't used it much (yet). I did put it together and attempted to use it. It has been MANY years since I've hooped, so I need to learn again. Life got in the way, but I am planning on using it soon. It is a beautifully constructed hoop.I can keep it going longer than the store purchased one. I won't mention the name, but it is just a child's hoop. This one is meant for adults.I'd say if you're looking to purchase one this one will be worth your investment.
customer_reviews.author: D L

customer_reviews.title: Love this hoop!!
customer_reviews.text: His hoop is just what I expected! Easy and quick to assemble, fun to use and great quality! We’ll see what results I get from using it! Like others have said, your waist does hurt/ feel a little tender for the first couple of days. But it’s not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Baden

customer_reviews.title: Weighted hoops are great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Weighted hoops are great for beginners, which I am. The foam padding may or may not be a good idea- mine's pretty banged up. Having said that, the connections are pretty solid because it hasn't come undone. BRUISING: This is a real thing. Do not be alarmed. I have since been told that even the light trick hoops will cause bruising in some beginners. It's not the hoop's fault and after a few days/weeks/months (depending on the individual) you stop bruising. You just have to keep up with it every day.
customer_reviews.author: slipslip

customer_reviews.title: Not durable, foam broke in three days
customer_reviews.text: Only uses for three days, foam surface starts to break. Not recommend to buy. I will update again if I see more signs of breaking.
customer_reviews.author: Chat

customer_reviews.title: Love this Weighted Hula Hoop
customer_reviews.text: I love this weighted hula hoop! When installing, make sure that they securely snap in correctly. At first, you need to get used to the weight, so the instruction suggest to hula hoop for only one minute or so per day, so you can get used to it. I leave it in the living room, and my husband and my daughter would just start hula hooping for fun! I also love that you can take it apart for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn S

customer_reviews.title: Had to get used this, not only because I ...
customer_reviews.text: Had to get used this, not only because I hadn't hula hooped in YEARS, but because the circumference seemed large. Just needed some practice! Other reviewers complained of some of the pieces not locking in or coming apart. If i came across a piece that wouldn't lock in, I'd simply try a different piece. I'd also tug at each new addition, to make sure it was "locked" in. I've had no issues.
customer_reviews.author: ksc30

customer_reviews.title: Fun to try
customer_reviews.text: A little hard to do at first. Still trying. It took some fiddling with it to get the pieces to snap into place tightly and not have the hula hoop fly apart when you use it but once they did it was fine. Make sure the first time you try that small children and dogs are not standing nearby or they may get hit with a flying piece!
customer_reviews.author: Purchaser

customer_reviews.title: Good for reducing waistline
customer_reviews.text: This is a good hula for beginners! it doesn't hurt like the others i've used in the past. I've tried my friends hulas and i was never able to learn but this one i caught on pretty quick. Most importantly, it works! i've seen the difference!
customer_reviews.author: Jeni Ho

customer_reviews.title: Great but u need room
customer_reviews.text: I saw this on tv and remembered how much I liked it as a kid, but wasn't sure if it would work for weight loss, like Kelly Osbourne claimed. It is a workout and three pounds doesn't sound like a lot, but it is. I had bruises on the side of my waist, but I do bruise easily. I got some dvd's that u can use the hoop with, a kind of dancing hula hoop exercise and it does look great and fun, but I can't do it in my house because the hoop is larger than u think and u need room to do the video. I could do it outside but don't want to embarrass myself.
customer_reviews.author: dragonmaiden

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with the product
customer_reviews.text: I was able to put it together. Dismantling it is impossible, I am not able to pull it out to make it a smaller circle or change its size. Not happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Dubinam

customer_reviews.title: So much fun and it really works!  Firming up!
customer_reviews.text: Had a little difficulty getting the hoop pieces to stay in but once I realized you had to twist it to lock it in, everything went together easily. Had no difficulty keeping the hoop up and I can really tell it is working my core and legs. Great exercise program and lots of fun to do. Makes you want to exercise because it is simple, easy and fun! Great product and seller.
customer_reviews.author: DrPepper1330

customer_reviews.title: 2 months, 10 pounds, 1 inch
customer_reviews.text: Over two months, I have built up to hooping 20-25 minutes a day, half with this hoop and half with a lighter one. I have also been counting calories and increasing my other activities, but I attribute my trimmer waist and torso to hooping. Have lost one inch on waist, and am noticeably more toned and taut in abdomen. No middle-age back pain or strained muscles since I made hooping part of my routine, I did have some tenderness at first, as others have mentioned. I then switched to a lighter hoop until I improved at hooping. Now the weight feels good, and definitely gives more of a cardio burn than my lighter hoop.
customer_reviews.author: Kitchen Maven

customer_reviews.title: WOW! LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I never learned how to Hula as a kid, so this was definitely a test to my stamina and repetitive fails. Well who knew my 50 yr old husband knew how to Hula! He tried it and said it was harder than a regular hula hoop due to the increased weight, BUT, he conquered it on his 2nd try and advised me that I have to spin it really fast to keep it hooping! I tried it the 1st time and I can now HULA! You can feel the burn and you get some cardio out of it due to the speed to spin!
customer_reviews.author: Ponitayl

customer_reviews.title: weighted sports hula hoop-3lb
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited about getting this hula hoop. I did read reviews that said it may leave bruises but I figured no big deal. I tried for a week to use it but it hurt so much after a minutes or two I couldn't ever do it for long and I had bruises all over. Its easy to put together, pretty, and is pretty sturdy if you put it together correctly but it just hurt to much to use. I tried wearing a sweatshirt while using it but didn't help much. Now just sitting in my house collecting dust lol
customer_reviews.author: stacey

customer_reviews.title: Scam!
customer_reviews.text: This would NOT stay together, even for a second! I wasn’t able to hoop for more than ONE revolution, no matter how many times I tried! SO disappointed!! Returned.
customer_reviews.author: CRT677

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, easy to put together!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! As you can see in my photo I placed the cheaper one I had, inside of this one! It is heavy and hurts my hips when it slides down but around my waist perfect!! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa’s Honest Reviews!

customer_reviews.title: Good exercise hoop
customer_reviews.text: This is my first hula hoop since childhood. They've come a long way. The 3 lbs. is perfect for exercise and the foam covering is very comfortable. I didn't experience any bruising. I was careful to put it together securely when I got it in the mail, and have not had any problem with it at all. It has been very handy especially during the rainy season when I can't get out to do much walking or bike riding. I think I will get a video next so that I can vary the use of the hoop a little. After I started using mine, my daughter decided to get one as well.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Lee

customer_reviews.title: super
customer_reviews.text: I'm always looking for new ways to spice up my daily exercise routine. This weighted hoop does the trick. Take heed, however, and start s l o w l y! I started with a minute or two and then upped it to five and almost couldn't get out of bed the next day. Take it easy and I'm sure you'll enjoy this wonderful alternative exercise "vehicle" as much as I do.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: For those who have never been able to hoop before....
customer_reviews.text: I have never been able to hula hoop in my life and this weighted hoop changed that. Within a week, I could easily do several minutes without thinking or dropping the hoop. Pay attention to the recommendation to "start slow" since the effect of the weight of the hoop on your waist and muscles takes some getting used to. Easy to assemble, but test each connection and make sure you hear a loud 'click' to be sure that the connections are locked in.
customer_reviews.author: Just My Opinion....

customer_reviews.title: Best hula hoop
customer_reviews.text: I actually use this every day for a few minutes, usually when there is music on, to work on reducing my muffin top. I have noticed a difference. I first bought a cheap plastic hoop and wasted my time and money. Dont bother making the same mistake.. this is the one that will make a difference in your workout. Remember to check each section closely, and listen for each one to click into place. If you use it for 5-10 minutes per day, you will see results in your waistline.. well, I did.
customer_reviews.author: S. C. Sutton

customer_reviews.title: At long last a US adult size hoop
customer_reviews.text: After trying multiple hoops that are advertised as adult size but are not, unless adults are the size of teenagers. This hula hoop is exactly what I was looking for, it is built for US sized adults and works well since it is wide and distributes the weight properly. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Shaul

customer_reviews.title: Hoola at Me!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE it!! So much fun as well as a great workout!
customer_reviews.author: Touched_By_Me

customer_reviews.title: Great workout
customer_reviews.text: The hula hoop is very easy to assemble, just make sure you snap the pieces together all the way or else they’ll go flying across the room but that was user error once properly assembled the hula hoop was the most fun I have ever had. A great work out you can totally feel it afterwards
customer_reviews.author: jasmine dejon

customer_reviews.title: great piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I had some trouble using plain hoop, but the weighted one is excellent- a fun way to exercise, sturdy, easy to assemble, durable
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Great tool! Enjoy the SHORT workout!
customer_reviews.text: Great fun! Useful exercise tool that is easy to keep doing, but don't overdo it. 3 Minutes to start is good. It seems so easy you want to keep going until you overdo it and are sore the next day. It really is great! Enjoy watching the pounds drop while having fun in a very short time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this hula hoop!
customer_reviews.text: I am very athletic, but could never hula hoop. I was shocked that I could hula hoop like a champ the first time I tried this. It is awesome!!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy E

customer_reviews.title: Quality is very good. It was a little tricky at first to ...
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time. Quality is very good. It was a little tricky at first to get apart but I took magic marker and made a tiny arrow where the buttons were and that made it easier for me instead of searching for them.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Love! Love! Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love my hoop! It assembled easily. Be careful Though. Make sure the pieces are all the way locked together. First use it came apart and a piece flung and hit my kid. These pieces aren’t light or flimsy...
customer_reviews.author: GillyGirl5688

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I got this from my husband, and I love it. Yes, you will be bruised, and yes, it takes a few days to get the hang of, but it is fantastic. The box warns you to only do ten minutes a day after the first couple of weeks, but that's rubbish. A couple of bruises is nothing compared to the sheer fun factor that it provides. I love it *so* much, and I cannot stop using it. I am absolutely hooked.
customer_reviews.author: Salem

customer_reviews.title: Help with lower back
customer_reviews.text: I can't say that I have actually lost any weight or toned my abs (but then again I do not use it consistently every day for 20 minutes). I do, however, love hula hooping and I love this weighted hula hoop. While I cannot claim to have lost weight it does help with my lower back. It is very easy to put together (although taking it a part did not seem that easy so I abandoned it). I usually hula hoop while I am watching TV - watching a 30 minute sitcom is a easy, fun and fast way to hula hoop for 20 minutes. All in all, I am happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: S. D. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: I love it. I been using it for a year ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I been using it for a year now and my back is stronger and I lost a lot of weight while having fun. You have to me mindful with your muscles and your movements if you want to work out and not just dance.
customer_reviews.author: Brisa

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: the joint constantly pop open while using, it's a hazarrd.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great beginners hoop; works your core if used regularly
customer_reviews.text: This hoop is a great beginners hoop. It fit together perfectly and was easy to assemble. Just push the links together until you hear a click. It has never fallen apart during hooping or even loosened. The hoop is heavy and swings around the body well. I was hoping to be able to try new tricks with this hoop, but it's a little too heavy for some tricks. It's better for standard hooping and working your core, which is basically why one would purchase a "weight loss hoop" anyway, right? If I really want to learn new tricks, I will look into other hoops, but this is great for starters.
customer_reviews.author: Aria

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Never been able to hoop before. Now I can keep this thing going for a long time! Its a good workout and the best part is that it picks up on my fit it! I saw in some of the reviews that some people had trouble with the pieces unlocking and the hoop falling apart while in use. I had that issue a few times in the beginning but I was able to figure it out and get the pieces twisted together properly.
customer_reviews.author: Nursey-poo

customer_reviews.title: Some of the pieces didn't attach securely, even after ...
customer_reviews.text: Some of the pieces didn't attach securely, even after following instructional video on how to attach them it still didn't work , it kept falling a part . the padding has a weird fishy smell
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Great hope! Just the right weight, the padding helps to a beginner, easy to keep in the air. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: HellGS

customer_reviews.title: this hula hoop has bruised my sides countless times. ...
customer_reviews.text: this hula hoop has bruised my sides countless times. I am trying to find something to go around my waist. I purchased a waist trainer and it doesn't help. Still working on it!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginners
customer_reviews.text: The hoop is as described and arrived on time. The first few attempts at assembly were frustrating. I would start to hula and the hoop would fall apart. Once I realized I missed a snap or two the problem was solved. I like the hoop, comfortable size and weight. I hope my skills improve with time lol.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Walker

customer_reviews.title: The best one EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many different hoops... and hands down!!... this one is the best. It breaks down easily, it goes together easily, it travels it a tiny box, and IT WORKS!! If you are going to try to get something less expensive, you are wasting your money. You will end up spending three times this amount trying others, and being disappointed. Save your money. Buy this one. :) You won't be sorry..
customer_reviews.author: Lavon

customer_reviews.title: Useful for a limited amount of time
customer_reviews.text: The hoop is pretty good until the foam starts to come off. Then it becomes useless as the bar under the foam will be painful while spinning it around your waste. It was fully intact for about 3/4 months before the foam started coming off. It doesn't come off all at one, but piece by piece over a period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product that Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product and you can really feel your muscles working during the workout and afterwards. I will be taking my measurements so I can see how many inches I lose.I have been hooping a few minutes a day for about 4 weeks and already lost 10 pounds since using this weighted hula hoop! Plus, there are many different workouts for different body areas that you can do with this product. The Sports Hoop website has many free workout videos available online.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Worst product ever! Return!
customer_reviews.text: Worst product I bought on Amazon. It won’t even stay together. Buy a whole one and not in these pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Great price good quality very easy to put together.
customer_reviews.text: We've only had it a few days but I can see the results on my wife already she really enjoys it.
customer_reviews.author: michael stewart

customer_reviews.title: Sports Hoop-Trim Hoop
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It is great exercise for toning core muscles. It also makes me feel like a kid again, it is that much fun! It can be used watching TV, listening to music, or just anytime in the house or outdoors. I have recommended it to others, who have then purchased one for themselves. The fact that it can easily be taken apart makes traveling with it so convenient. This is a keeper!
customer_reviews.author: Bookworm

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It's fun to hoop again. Like others said, initially the pieces would come apart. I had to open and close some of them a few times, as they kept falling off when I started. Now they are all stuck together nicely, and I enjoy reliving my childhood with some hooping action.
customer_reviews.author: JuliaABC

customer_reviews.title: Love this - my core is already in pain
customer_reviews.text: Love this - my core is already in pain. Ive been using it for two weeks. However, you need to be a bit of a hooper first. I could initially only swing it around 1-2 times - then whacked my leg- I have a huge bruise. So, I suggest doing just one revolution at a time and then catching the hoop - then work up to two, then 3 so on so forth -
customer_reviews.author: Laureen Turner

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: My mom uses this to work out She loves it and uses it all the time
customer_reviews.author: Keri Hubert

customer_reviews.title: Fun exercise, youll feel it in you core and legs
customer_reviews.text: You feel the burn after a few minutes of use. It's a fun way to burn calories while you watch TV or challenge your kid in a hula hoop battle. It hurts slightly at first, you have to work your tolerance up as the weighted hoop squishes your flesh
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Try this weighted sports hoop. It's fun and it really works!
customer_reviews.text: As a grandma, I found the hula hoop at first too big. Trying it out a few times, I got the hang of it and this thing really works. I wear one or two tee shirts so that I wont feel the heavy rings around my waist. Now my granddaughter is using it and she loves the ease and fun of this hoop. You actually can feel a good work out and you can actually lose an inch or two around your waist.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Nellie

customer_reviews.title: Colorful, fun, and effective for toning abs
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and assemble. Haven't had the need to disassemble yet. I've used it for almost half a year now, and a little piece of foam has torn off. Otherwise, still durable and comfortable to use. It did not leave any bruises. I used it for two weeks, maybe 5 minutes a day, 1-2 x per day, and did see some slight improvement on my waistline. Will continue to use!
customer_reviews.author: Macaron42

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love my hula-hoop. I've had it for a year, and still is in great conditions, and use it.
customer_reviews.author: Gladys

customer_reviews.title: Love this weighted hoop
customer_reviews.text: Love this weighted hoop. It is easy and fun. It seems easy at first, but be careful not to over do it. Your abs will be a bit sore initially if you don't pace yourself!
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect..
customer_reviews.text: Perfect ...First few times I tried to use it flew apart but after I read the instructions and did it correctly (very simple me not the hoop:) I have hooped it many miles with no accidents :) and I really think its taking inches off my waistline ...Its fun too !
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Not even usable.
customer_reviews.text: I assembled this hoop... "used" it... every time I did the hoop would separate at one of the joints and just drop to the floor. So I tried to reassemble different ways... no luck. One of the segments had a faulty "connector"... after I'd dissemble it, that particular piece would audibly "pop" into place about 15 minutes later. I returned it. Absolutely unusable.
customer_reviews.author: ST

customer_reviews.title: Nostalgic fun w/ a dash of maturity
customer_reviews.text: Ever since I was younger, I've always enjoyed hula hooping. This brought back those fond memories and provided a fun workout! Maybe I'm a bit fragile, but it hurts like hell! Feels like you're constantly getting punched in your sides. To counter this, I used an abdominal sweat wrap for a little extra padding, and that seemed to prevent any possible bruising. Although it is fun, I got a bit bored with it, and a little discouraged because of the pain, but I still use it occasionally for a nice twist to my workout.
customer_reviews.author: KkUu

customer_reviews.title: The hoop is great because it has the foam so it won't hurt ...
customer_reviews.text: The hoop is great because it has the foam so it won't hurt you as much but you do get a bruise around your hips the first time you use it. I use this all the time while watching tv or reading a book standing. This is great if you have to squeeze in an exercise or can't go to the gym to to an injury like myself. The price is not that bad either.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Chung

customer_reviews.title: Great...Lots of Fun!
customer_reviews.text: I was never great as a kid at hooping but decided it was "never to late" to improve. The 3.5 lb. hoop was recommended for my height and weight. After only a few tries, I'm pretty good at it. I only wish I had selected the 2.5 lb. hoop. as I find myself a bit tired after about 15 minutes. Maybe I should have mentioned to the person advising me that I am 71 years old. I hate having to assemble things, but this was easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Miz P.ff. ggg

customer_reviews.title: Good hoop, right size and weight
customer_reviews.text: Good hoop, right size and weight. The connection between the segments could be better as it requires some twisting to get it locked. Overall, good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Boris Yoffe

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: heavy, but easy to use, in fact, easier than a regular hula hoop.
customer_reviews.author: Slammer

customer_reviews.title: Nice hoop, just not best for me
customer_reviews.text: Heavier than what I am used to and have a harder time keeping it going. Good to challange myself with something different though. No problems with it falling apart if you make sure the pieces clicked together properly. Not sure if I like the foam covering..it seems to make the hoop bulky.
customer_reviews.author: energizer

customer_reviews.title: This weight loss sports hoop is very colorful and actually ...
customer_reviews.text: This weight loss sports hoop is very colorful and actually gave us the insentive to want to exercise with it. The problem is, it would not stay snapped together while hooping. Thanks anyway though!
customer_reviews.author: TTkr

customer_reviews.title: refund a half
customer_reviews.text: It's too heavy to use. I had to return it because it hurt me. But I only got a half refund. I spent nearly twenty dollars in return fees on the product doesn't belong to me
customer_reviews.author: Kkk

customer_reviews.title: Hoopin love
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with this. I can't stop hooping. I did get bruises on my hip bones (ummm welcome back hip bones) but they healed quickly. This is great for your midsection. Simple to put together and take apart if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri Doran

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love that I can do this because it’s heavier than toy hula hoops.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Gee

customer_reviews.title: Not as hurtful as i thought it would be.
customer_reviews.text: So far I really like this product. I was expecting it to hurt me based on other reviews but it wasn't that bad. It's easy to travel with, pretty easy to take apart and put together, once you get the hang of the locking system and the weight is just right. I haven't seen any major results from using it but it's fun enough to keep trying. I enjoy the bright colors too. If you're looking for a reasonably priced travel hula hoop, than this is the one for you.
customer_reviews.author: LisaLisa

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I love my weighted hula hoop! I should have bought 2!!! I would recommend buying from this seller! 5 star service and product!
customer_reviews.author: Ericka Taylor

product_meta.title: Sports Hoop Weighted Hoop, Weight Loss Trim Hoop 3B - 3.1lb (41 inches Wide) Large, Weighted Fitness Exercise Hoop with No Wavy Ridges (Rainbow)
feature_bullets: Use only 5 minutes per day and see significant waist trims and fat loss in less than 2 weeks. No ridges. Traditional smooth inner circle.
Maximizes weight loss and improves workout results. Weighs 3.1 pounds (1.4 kg) and measures 41 inches (104cm) across.
USPTO trademarked wavy ridges design and brand. GS certified. Exceeds international safety and quality standards. Comfortable foam paddings. High quality, durable plastic.
Easily attachable/detachable into 8 smaller pieces. Great for storage and easy to carry around.
For teenagers and adults weighing between be 100lb and 160lb. Easy way to both have fun and adopt a healthy lifestyle. Weighs 3.1 pounds and measures 41 inches wide.
